article_title: Anthem Joins Blue Cross' State Farm Deal To Sell Obamacare

article_metadata.description: Anthem (ANTM) will join with an alliance of Blue Cross Blue Shield plans in a partnership with State Farm to sell Blues branded individual medical policies under the Affordable Care Act. Anthem, which sells Blue Cross brand plans in more than a dozen states, will expand a partnership with the Blue [...]
